name: Promotion to COO
description: Tim Cook is promoted to Chief Operating Officer (COO) of Apple Inc., responsible for worldwide sales and operations.

name: Launch of iPod shuffle
description: Under Tim Cook’s operations leadership, Apple launches the iPod shuffle, a new portable music player.

name: Apple's Acquisition of NeXT
description: Apple completes its acquisition of NeXT, a company founded by Steve Jobs, leading to the development of Mac OS X.

name: Introduction of iPhone
description: Apple unveils the first iPhone, a revolutionary product that integrates a phone, an iPod, and an internet communicator.

name: App Store Launch
description: The Apple App Store is launched, providing a platform for third-party apps on iOS devices.

name: Introduction of iPhone 3GS
description: Apple introduces the iPhone 3GS, offering improved performance and new features like video recording.

name: Introduction of iPhone 4
description: Apple unveils the iPhone 4, featuring a new design, Retina display, and the FaceTime video calling feature.

name: Tim Cook Named CEO
description: Tim Cook is officially named CEO of Apple Inc., succeeding Steve Jobs who steps down due to health issues.

name: Becomes CEO of Apple Inc.
description: Tim Cook is formally appointed as CEO of Apple Inc., marking a significant transition in the company’s leadership.
